channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Edit is now open source】编辑现在是开源的
item.description: 【What is Edit? Edit is a new command-line text editor in Windows. Edit is open source, so you can build the code or install the latest version from GitHub! This CLI text editor will be available to preview in the Windows Insider Program in the coming months. After that, it will ship as part of […]】什么是编辑？编辑是Windows中的新命令行文本编辑器。编辑是开源的，因此您可以构建代码或从Github安装最新版本！该CLI文本编辑器将在未来几个月内可以在Windows Insider程序中预览。之后，它将作为[…]的一部分发货

item.title: 【Accelerate Your .NET Upgrades with GitHub Copilot】加速您的.NET升级使用GitHub Copilot
item.description: 【Upgrade your .NET apps with confidence! Introducing our newest AI-powered upgrade experience, GitHub Copilot app modernization - Upgrade for .NET.】充满信心地升级.NET应用程序！介绍了我们最新的AI驱动升级体验，Github Copilot App Modernization -.NET升级。

item.title: 【Accelerating MongoDB Development on Azure: What’s New at Microsoft Build 2025】加速Azure上的MongoDB开发：Microsoft Build 2025的新功能
item.description: 【Microsoft Build 2025 is underway in Seattle, bringing developers together to shape the future of cloud-native app development. If you build MongoDB workloads in Azure, this year’s updates give you even more tools to accelerate development. We’ve streamlined how you build and modernize MongoDB applications in the cloud with our managed service- vCore-based Azure Cosmos […]】Microsoft Build 2025在西雅图正在进行，将开发人员汇集在一起​​，以塑造云本地应用开发的未来。如果您在Azure中构建MongoDB工作负载，今年的更新为您提供了更多的工具来加速开发。我们已经简化了如何使用我们的基于托管服务的Azure Cosmos […]在云中构建和现代化MongoDB应用程序的现代化应用程序。

item.title: 【Agent mode for every developer】每个开发人员的代理模式
item.description: 【At the beginning of April, agent mode rolled out to all users in Visual Studio Code. Since then, we’ve seen and heard how developers are embracing this tool and using it to transform their workflows. Now, just six weeks later, we’re excited to announce that it’s available to all developers using VS Code, Visual Studio, […]】在4月初，Agent Mode将Visual Studio代码中的所有用户推出。从那以后，我们看到并听到了开发人员如何拥抱此工具并使用它来改变他们的工作流程。现在，仅仅六周后，我们很高兴地宣布，使用VS代码，Visual Studio，[…]的所有开发人员都可以使用它。

item.title: 【Supercharge AI development with new AI-powered features in Microsoft Dev Box】Microsoft Dev Box中具有新的AI驱动功能的增压AI开发
item.description: 【AI is reshaping how we build, deploy, and scale software. As more apps become AI-powered, developers need environments that can keep up with speed and demands of innovation. We’ve heard from customers just how critical it is to have a zero-config experience when building AI applications, with streamlined access to compute, prebuilt models, and environment […]】AI正在重塑我们的构建，部署和规模软件。随着越来越多的应用程序成为AI驱动的，开发人员需要能够跟上创新速度和需求的环境。我们从客户那里听说，在构建AI应用程序时具有零核能体验的重要性，并简化了对计算，预制模型和环境的访问[…]

item.title: 【Announcing the General Availability (GA) of JSON data type & JSON aggregates…】宣布JSON数据类型和JSON聚合的一般可用性（GA）…
item.description: 【We are excited to announce the General Availability (GA) of the native JSON data type and JSON aggregates – JSON_OBJECTAGG & JSON_ARRAYAGG. You can use the JSON data type and JSON aggregates to integrate and work with JSON documents more efficiently in the database. This functionality is available in Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed […]】我们很高兴宣布本机JSON数据类型和JSON聚合的一般可用性（GA） - JSON_OBJECTAGG和JSON_ARRAYAGG。您可以使用JSON数据类型和JSON聚合物在数据库中更有效地集成和使用JSON文档。此功能可在Azure SQL数据库中获得，Azure SQL托管[…]

item.title: 【Unlocking the Power of Regex in SQL Server】在SQL Server中解锁正则强度
item.description: 【Regular expressions, or regex, are powerful tools for text manipulation and pattern matching. They are incredibly useful in various scenarios, such as data validation, extraction, and transformation. SQL Server 2025 introduces native support for regex functions, making it easier to perform complex text operations directly within SQL queries. This Regex support is available in SQL […]】正则表达式或正则是正则是文本操作和图案匹配的强大工具。它们在各种情况（例如数据验证，提取和转换）中非常有用。 SQL Server 2025引入了对正则函数的本机支持，从而更容易在SQL查询中直接执行复杂的文本操作。 SQL […]可用此正则支持。

item.title: 【.NET Aspire 9.3 is here and enhanced with GitHub Copilot!】。
item.description: 【.NET Aspire 9.3 is the biggest release of .NET Aspire yet, with the introduction of GitHub Copilot directly into the .NET Aspire Dashboard, updates for integrations, app model enhancements, and more.】。

item.title: 【GitHub Copilot: Exploring Agent Mode and MCP Support in Public Preview for Xcode】GitHub Copilot：在Xcode的公共预览中探索代理模式和MCP支持
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce that GitHub Copilot’s Agent Mode and Model Context Protocol (MCP) support are now available in public preview for Xcode! This brings powerful autonomous coding capabilities to macOS developers using Xcode. What is Agent Mode? Agent Mode turns GitHub Copilot into an intelligent pair programmer that can understand your intent, plan multi-step […]】我们很高兴地宣布，GitHub Copilot的代理模式和模型上下文协议（MCP）支持现在可以在XCode的Public Preview中获得！这为MacOS开发人员提供了强大的自主编码功能。什么是代理模式？代理模式将GitHub Copilot变成了一个智能的配对程序员，可以理解您的意图，计划多步骤[…]

item.title: 【Vibe coding with GitHub Copilot: Agent mode and MCP support in JetBrains and Eclipse】使用GitHub Copilot编码的氛围：喷气桥和Eclipse中的代理模式和MCP支持
item.description: 【Today, we’re excited to announce that GitHub Copilot Agent Mode and MCP support are now in public preview for both JetBrains and Eclipse! Whether you’re working in IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, WebStorm or Eclipse, you can now access Copilot’s intelligent agent features and seamlessly manage your project workflows, all from within your IDE. In this post, we’ll […]】今天，我们很高兴地宣布，Github Copilot Agent Mode和MCP支持现在已在Jetbrains和Eclipse的公开预览中！无论您是在Intellij Idea，Pycharm，Webstorm还是Eclipse中工作，现在都可以访问Copilot的智能代理功能，并无缝管理您的项目工作流程，全部来自您的IDE。 在这篇文章中，我们将[…]
